types.html:
maison hantée f (plural maisons hantées)

  1. haunted house (house believed to be a center for supernatural occurrences)
  2. haunted house (Halloween amusement attraction in which a building or series of rooms is decorated to frighten the people who pass through the attraction)

title: maison hantée
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /mɛ.zɔ̃ ɑ̃.te/ ~ /me.zɔ̃ ɑ̃.te/
